meta.title: SuitOps - Complete business management solution
meta.description: Complete business management platform. Simplify your daily management with our innovative solutions.

footer.tagline:
A complete solution to optimize
your processes and boost your productivity.

modules.emailModuleDescription: Centralize your business exchanges with an intelligent and collaborative inbox.
modules.emailModuleFeature1: Reception and sending of professional emails
modules.emailModuleFeature2: Management of instructions and team processing
modules.hrModuleDescription: Simplify your human resources management, from contracts to attendance.
modules.documentModuleDescription: Store, organize, and secure all your documents in one place.
modules.recruitmentModuleDescription: Easily manage recruitment, from job offer to hiring.
modules.recruitmentModuleFeature1: Publication and tracking of job offers
modules.planningModuleDescription: Organize your events, meetings, and tasks with ease.
modules.billingModuleDescription: Automate invoice creation and track your payments in real time.
modules.billingModuleFeature3: Detailed reports and cash flow management

features.businessReportsDescription: With detailed analysis tools and a responsive dashboard, track your progress in real time. Identify your strengths and areas for improvement to adjust your strategy.
features.crmDescription: An email manager integrated directly into the software. It allows you to gather all information related to your professional contacts in one place, keep in touch with your customers, discuss and collaborate with them.
features.documentManagementDescription: Synchronize all your files, whether in image or PDF format; never lose your documents again. Import them and take them with you wherever you go thanks to the power of the online library tool.
features.payslipEditingDescription: What makes up your employees' salaries? This tool allows you to easily detail what your employees receive monthly, download payslips, or send them directly by email.
features.purchaseInvoicesDescription: Practical for managing and getting an idea of your expenses. Record your purchase invoices and keep your documents in your professional space for better utilization and cash flow tracking.
features.vatSupportDescription: It's not always easy to manually assemble all your invoices and calculate VAT manually. Our e-invoicing tool handles VAT.
features.superAgendaDescription: Don't forget anything with this tool. This feature allows you to access all your past, present, and future tasks. Plan your meetings and other important events for the functioning of your structure.
features.realTimeCollaborationDescription: Work with your teammates and save time on heavy tasks. Distribute your tasks, create a trusted environment, and achieve your goals together.
features.recruitersDescription: With our tools, issuing offers and obtaining applications becomes child's play. Get applications more easily and choose the profile that best matches your offer.
features.brainstormingTestDescription: Test your candidates and find out who is the best. Launch your online recruitment test and let your candidates complete it. You no longer necessarily need to print anything.
features.trainerDescription: Become the best 'BOSS' for your employees. Regularly organize training sessions and meetings and encourage their participation to see their skills grow.
features.cloudStorageDescription: Never lose your work or data again. Save your progress in cloud storage and access it anywhere, anytime.
features.timeManagementDescription: Your time is precious. Our tools reshape your ways of working and simplify your life. Recruit, train, manage your schedule, and do many other things with incredible speed.
features.technicalSupportDescription: Lost? Need help? We are here, very close to you, and will help you get satisfaction for your concern.
